summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Telenexus WhatsApp API integration with Evolution API. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend loads correctly but has registration form validation issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Email field validation error - form doesn't accept valid email addresses and shows company name in email field instead of actual email

integration_issues.issue: Registration form submission fails due to email validation, preventing access to dashboard

passed_tests: Backend Health Check with Evolution API Connection (Status: connected)
WhatsApp Instance Creation API (POST /api/instances) - Creates real Evolution API instance
Get Instances List API (GET /api/instances) - Shows real status from Evolution API
Get Single Instance API (GET /api/instances/{id}) - Returns QR code from Evolution API
Delete Instance API (DELETE /api/instances/{id}) - Also deletes from Evolution API
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix email validation issue in registration form. The email input field is incorrectly displaying company name instead of email and failing validation. This blocks the entire user registration flow and dashboard access.
